issues.title: Follow Redirects
issues.body: RestClient supports follow redirects and I guess it can be useful.

issues.title: Use correct log levels
issues.body:
I guess we should use these log levels:

**HIT:** DEBUG
**MISS:** INFO
**STALE:** WARNING
**TIMEOUT:** ERROR

issues.title: Retry when do not have a stale cache
issues.body: It will be nice to have a way to retry with a high timeout when do not have a cache stale after the first timeout. It can prevent errors.

commit.message: Fix error message matching in test

Merge pull request #12 from globocom/fix-stale-on-error-config

stale_on_error returns true if theres no config

Revert "Revert "Default value for stale_on_error""

This reverts commit 7032ba679e791e58ef542fc8afc8e8f592e61c1c.

Merge pull request #11 from globocom/revert-10-stale-on-error-config

Revert "Default value for stale_on_error"

Merge pull request #10 from globocom/stale-on-error-config

Default value for stale_on_error

Stale on error: returns true if theres no config,
typo and improves specs to use FakeConfig instead of OpenStruct

Merge pull request #7 from aitherios/proxy

Fix proxy usage with content_gateway
Use calls with proxy via rest-client 1.x style
Allow to not stale when error. Closes #5
Mapping JSON parse errors to ContentGateway::ParserError
Adding ssl_version support to ssl_certificate hash
Optional url generator. (Without the url generator on boot the content gateway will use the get/post/delete/put resource argument as full url for request). Closes #4
Do not send connection, ssl and headers to UrlGenerator. Closes #2. Sending headers to POST, PUT and DELETE. Closes #3.
Solving cache problem when using ssl in requests. The solution was convert the result of the request to string before save the cache value.
accepting ssl certificates in requests parameters
Starting support of ssl certificates in requests
Adding more tests to Cache class
Updating Ruby version and replacing debugger with byebug
Ignoring cache after an internal server error when skip_cache = true
Utilizando o artifactory como repositorio de gems. Task de release
Added support for HTTP 404 Conflict errors.
Don't lock activeresource dependency to a specific version.
Using try to get proxy from config to avoid error when not exists.
Utilizando o try para pegar o proxy de configs que não tenham.
Return empty when result is not a RestClient object and do not have "code" method.
Permitindo passar valores padrão de headers, que serão enviados em todos as requests.
Ajustando o padrão da configuração que o gateway recebe.
Permitindo usar um proxy nas chamadas.
Permitindo passar headers no request. Um caso de uso é o token de esportes que vai sempre pelo header.
Servindo stale quando der erro 500 no servidor.
Modificado a flag admin para uma flag chamada skip_cache
Primeiro commit. Ainda está um saco de gato e estou refatorando.

issue_comments.body: Added ssl support in requests  (tag: 0.2.0 - commit 81d74651a857ba00d603d957c655c3ba29b3b229)

It only lacks a configuration option, but already implemented.

https://github.com/globocom/content-gateway-ruby/blob/master/lib/content_gateway/cache.rb#L40-L46

[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/builds/9318656/badge)](https://coveralls.io/builds/9318656)

Coverage remained the same at 99.631% when pulling **1a5eb82d83ce681ef9a38a79cf22809e9e7d0ab9 on fix-stale-on-error-config** into **024de08bfa20fc07d3105a68fe01c3105a30c5f6 on master**.
